resources.string: You can reach the venue using one of the following bus lines: 1, 10, 111. Please make sure that you check the schedule of the public transport.
Kirov Palace(Maritza Str. near Panair bridge)
We want to say big thanks to our sponsors! Whitout them this event would be just a dream in our eyes. You can tap the images below to go to their webpages and show them some love!

PlovDev is one day dev conference. The goal of the event is to bring together students and professional, which can exchange knowledge and experience and bring the IT community in the town on higher level. The diversity of the lectures is there to bring people with different interest together. The event is organized by Proxiad Bulgaria with the kind help of Hackafe.
The event will be held on 18 October, 2014
If you want, you can rate the lecture. The vote is anonymous. Please be CARREFUL, you can\'t change your vote!
You need to close the app for this change to take effect!
